## Functions

### emitConstantSizeRepmov() {#a6d50362e845dcbafcf632cb5b98b240f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static SDValue emitConstantSizeRepmov (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &amp; DAG, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86subtarget">X86Subtarget</a> &amp; Subtarget, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdloc">SDLoc</a> &amp; dl, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Chain, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Dst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Src, uint64&#95;t Size, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> SizeVT, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment, bool isVolatile, bool AlwaysInline, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> DstPtrInfo, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> SrcPtrInfo)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns a REP MOVS instruction, possibly with a few load/stores to implement a constant size memory copy.

In some cases where we know REP MOVS is inefficient we return an empty <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> so the calling code can either generate a load/store sequence or call the runtime memcpy function.

Definition at line <a href="#l00267">267</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86selectiondaginfo-cpp">X86SelectionDAGInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### emitConstantSizeRepstos() {#ac6a86b853c0a0262731e7e8b084c0980}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static SDValue emitConstantSizeRepstos (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &amp; DAG, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86subtarget">X86Subtarget</a> &amp; Subtarget, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdloc">SDLoc</a> &amp; dl, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Chain, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Dst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Val, uint64&#95;t Size, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> SizeVT, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment, bool isVolatile, bool AlwaysInline, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> DstPtrInfo)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns a REP STOS instruction, possibly with a few load/stores to implement a constant size memory set.

In some cases where we know REP MOVS is inefficient we return an empty <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> so the calling code can either generate a store sequence or call the runtime memset function.

Definition at line <a href="#l00122">122</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86selectiondaginfo-cpp">X86SelectionDAGInfo.cpp</a>.

<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Returns a REP MOVS instruction, possibly with a few load/stores to implement</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a constant size memory copy. In some cases where we know REP MOVS is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// inefficient we return an empty SDValue so the calling code can either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// generate a load/store sequence or call the runtime memcpy function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267" lineLink="#a6d50362e845dcbafcf632cb5b98b240f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="#a6d50362e845dcbafcf632cb5b98b240f">emitConstantSizeRepmov</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isVolatile, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AlwaysInline,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// In case we optimize for size, we use repmovsb even if it&#39;s less efficient</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// TODO: Revisit next line: big copy with ERMSB on march &gt;= haswell are very</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// efficient.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!AlwaysInline &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; Subtarget.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86subtarget/#ad758ae414ac0d2976b79f246292e54a3">getMaxInlineSizeThreshold</a>())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// We assume runtime memcpy will do a better job for unaligned copies when</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> BlockType = <a href="#a70bdf72b815f67e983ebd11418251738">getOptimalRepType</a>(Subtarget, Alignment);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle the last 1 - 7 bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;SDValue, 4&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a7e344cff0feadf0b02223fee63cc7475">Results</a>.push&#95;back(RepMovs);</span></CodeLine>
